context:

[WhenUse] When inflicting [Laceration] with this Skill, inflict [Burst] equal to [HardenedBlood] on self as well
[EndSkill] Consume all [HardenedBlood] and [BloodyHand]

[WhenUse] 対象の[Laceration]が6以上なら、基本威力 +1
[WhenUse] このスキルで対象へ[Laceration]を付与するとき、自分に[HardenedBlood]だけ[Burst]を追加で付与
[EndSkill] [HardenedBlood], [BloodyHand]を全て消耗

context:
EN :

JP :
